QuestData.Title: Quakefist
QuestData.Description: I'm getting reports of a giant in the forest.$b$bA few of the Karabor peacekeepers have followed it to a cave. In all honesty I don't think any of our troops are willing to engage the beast.$b$bMaybe you could investigate? I'm sure the peacekeepers would appreciate the help.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you kill the giant in the cave?
QuestData.RewardText: The base is significantly more secure with that giant dead.$b$bYou have made quite an impression on the peacekeepers.
